lines: Time / to balloon sideways
Time / to reconsider the diagonal of oranges
Time / to whisper beneath the cardboard
Time / to be erroneously significant
Time / to curate a teaspoon of thunder
Time / to orbit your uninvited alphabet
Time / to invent backwards
Time / to melt the approximate slipper
Time / to gargle with distance
Time / to echo inside a lowercase planet
Time / to be the anecdote of forks
Time / to sleep diagonally
Time / to smear the sky with paragraphs
Time / to juggle three melancholies and a peach
Time / to varnish the ambiguous cactus
Time / to be lightly misprinted
Time / to sketch a hypothesis in spaghetti
Time / to outgrow the sentimental octagon
Time / to be a fragment inside a loop
Time / to unwrap the static of questions
Time / to sip from a hypothetical chimney
Time / to hum politely at entropy
Time / to be mistaken for tomorrow
Time / to forget in cursive
Time / to archive your invisible umbrella
Time / to sigh near a receding piston
Time / to alphabetize the flavor of fog
Time / to gallop gently into punctuation
Time / to host a dinner for unsolved riddles
Time / to become the lowercase version of courage
